name: Kadabra

evolution.description: Kadabra can evolve into Alakazam at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 7 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Psi Pokémon. Many odd things happen if this Pokémon is close by. For example, it makes clocks run backward.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If this Pokémon becomes burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, its attacker receives the negative status condition as well (if not immune).

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is subjected to a move that forces it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage on a success.
